name: Cowboy VS alien
description:
Cowboy vs Alien is a 2D top down shooter on the far west.

You incarnate a cowboy with many weapon and item who need to protect her cows from a alien invasion.

For this project I do everything except some decors and UI background.

Trailer available on youtube : https://youtu.be/0wS4TgPQARo

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/YazO3Y
